name: Disability to exist at accrual of action
text:
No person shall avail oneself of any disability enumerated in this part, unless the disability existed at the time the right of action accrued. [CC 1859, §1046; RL 1925, §2649; RL 1935, §3920; RL 1945, §10431; RL 1955, §241-13; HRS ; am L 1972, c 105, §1(g); gen ch 1985]
Case Notes
  Cited:  29 H. 579, 586.
